meanings.definition: A person who counts or lists items.
meanings.sent1: The enumerator carefully counted all the apples in the basket.
meanings.sent2: The enumerator wrote down the number of students in the class.
meanings.sent3: The enumerator playfully pretended to count the clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like an enumerator, meticulously scanning each page of the book.
meanings.sent5: The enumerator's job was to tally up the total number of books in the library.

meanings.definition: A function or method in programming that iterates through a collection of items.
meanings.sent1: The enumerator in the program looped through each element in the array.
meanings.sent2: The software engineer used an enumerator to go through the list of names.
meanings.sent3: The enumerator code snippet seemed to dance through the data effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: In the digital world, the enumerator acted like a diligent tour guide through the dataset.
meanings.sent5: The enumerator function made it easy to access each item in the list.
